author: Olivia
text: Unfortunately I haven’t had a good experience with VC. I made a sale on good Friday and you are given 5 days to send the parcel. I happened to be leaving to spend time away over Easter and didn’t have time to print the shipping label so when it came to sending the parcel I wrote the address out manually and sent it. I told Vestiaire collective I had done this and they just cancelled the sale without waiting to find out if it was all fine. They say they are now unable to reinstate the sale so I have now lost £150 and I have no facility to contact the buyer!! Really bloody annoying experience
title: Poor customer service

author: SimonSimonhei
text: Amazing experience selling with Vestiaire. Safe trading and really easy
title: Amazing experience selling with…

author: Eliza
text: Vestiaire are GREAT! I have a stunning wardrobe and can contribute to recycling and salvaging clothes to utilise the energy and resources used to make such special garments. Thank you Vestiaire!
title: Vestiaire are GREAT

author: chittaphat
text: Very good I love it
title: Very good

author: MorikenKourouma
text: Security garantie
title: Super

author: Νάντια Κωστάκη
text: Trustworthy mediator, the process is quite simple, took almost a week to complete everything and to have the money to my account. Overall excellent service!
title: Trustworthy mediator

author: oxanaAmos
text: Thanks a team for professional service! Pleasure to order! Best regards 🙏
title: Thanks a team for professional service

author: codeluppi elisabetta
text: It’s a great site to buy and sell high end clothing items. They do a very good service also in authentication (they charge an extra for it but it’s money well spent) the 5th star is missing only because the commissions for sellers are very high. Too much in my opinion even if I understand that they have also high costs to afford in terms of staff.
title: It’s a great site to buy and sell high…

author: nick ho
text: Love this apps!! Allow room for buyer and seller to further nego to reach final deal.
title: Love this apps!

author: Mariam Choksy
text:
I bought a bag from this company. They charged me £15 to authenticate it. They said the bag is authentic and shipped it out to me. I got the bag authenticated by two other companies once I reviews it  and both companies said  the bag is fake! I have certificate to show it’s not authentic. I opened a dispite on  vestiaire and they are ignoring my messages! 
First and last time I will be purchasing from this company.
title: I bought a bag from this company

author: Jeremy Beaumont
text:
Trustworthy and efficient 
Duties paid so customs is smooth
title: Trustworthy and efficient

author: Sophie
text: Received my order ( item ref 22612943) last Wednesday..:saw immediately that the belt was not ‘in perfect condition’…the leather was all wrinkled up and it was obviously it had been worn a lot…unbelievable that this has passed quality control…reported this immediately, accompanied with the  necessary pictures…I m still waiting for feedback…
title: Order not compliant

author: Sarah French-Fleming
text: Vestaire is now taking a 3 % commission fee on top of the 12%......basically we work for them. not the th e other way around..only sell if you must get rid of the item....
title: Vestaire is now taking a 3 % commission…

author: David
text:
Hello Francheska Mari A,
(Support Vestiaire Collective)

Thank you for your email regarding item: 52802957 Ref: 22390385.

I wish to complain about a Louis Vuitton Leather travel bag (22390385) that I purchased on 12/04/2022 on Vestiaire Collective.

I am complaining because on numerous occasions I have been told (assured) I would receive a full refund after 21 of purchase/investigation. However, this has not be the case.

I first learned of this problem with the Sellers shipping (address not recognised) and was told nothing could be done about the problem until after 21-days of purchase. I believe that this response is unfair because of the lack of professionalism and conflicting timelines given since the issue began.

I would like confirmation from you explaining Vestiaire Collective’s position on my refund and what you will do about my complaint.

I look forward to hearing from you as soon as possible to resolve this problem.
title: Hello Francheska Mari A,

author: Egle Vilunaite
text:
Commission is a rip off ! Constant emails and notifications to lower your price are super annoying and now they also charge you € 12 for shipping your item back to you if they decide item is inauthentic or they keep it. 
I'm deleting my account with them, will not let them to make another euro on my behalf.
Perhaps as a buyer you can get good deals but from seller perspective is it's a nightmare.
title: Commission is a rip off

author: Natasha Kaur
text:
This site obviously doesn’t want to sell or make money. I ordered an item but wasn’t as described which QC picked up only had option to cancel or accept not negotiate with seller based on information not disclosed. 

Based on customer chat not advice I cancelled and Reached an agreement with seller to buy at reduced price via messaging but VC are taking forever to relist the chat people are useless we have both spent hours and they clearly don’t understand the issue.

The seller and I are having a nightmare getting this sale done. I can Imagine easy site if everything goes to plan but if you need help forget it! All I want to do is buy a bag which is the purpose of your site. 

Honestly use designer exchange or another site far better customer experience.
title: This site obviously doesn’t want to…

author: marlene
text: It's all great! Went smoothly percent 100 a okay
title: It's all great

author: zara
text: Veel 👍 good ,super service
title: Veel 👍 good

author: Frankie Cronin
text: I love Vestiaire! I’ve bought premium pieces like Alexander McQueen and Gucci shoes on this website in very good condition for reasonable price (versus the RRP). Shopping preloved pieces is better for the environment too!
title: Great prices on premium products!

author: sandraHenry
text: Very delighted with my Gucci shoes, arrived on time. Thy look just like on the picture.Will definitely purchasing more items. Love them.
title: Gucci shoes
